reviews.review: игра говно, но мне интересно в нее играть
es un gran shooter pero lo mejor es jugarlo con amigos, asi que si sos un tryhard ojala no me toques en mi equipo porque te voy a putear, de nada por la reseña
ive played this game since before i was 14. im 30 now and still enjoy every game!

CS:GO is always fun to play with your friends whilst youre destroying the enemys, but then suddenly the bottom fragger of the other team starts hitting headshots you didnt even know about being possible. 
These are simply summarized the both possible outcomes there are when playing matchmaking.
But there has to be said in the most recent like 6 or 7 years the more likely option was to get obliterated by all 5 enemys cheating.
P.S. still a fcking addicting game thats why we re all still playing ...
